actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend the Military Selective Service Act to reduce to $200 the maximum penalty applicable to persons who fail to register under that Act during any period when there is no authority to induct persons into the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Amends the Military Selective Service Act to reduce to $200 the penalty for failing to register for the draft when there is no induction authority provided.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Military Selective Service Act to reduce to $200 the maximum penalty applicable to persons who fail to register under that Act during any period when there is no authority to induct persons into the Armed Forces.
